issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: FS based stats collection generates wrong results for tez (for union queries)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: FS stats collection may generate incorrect stats for multi-insert query

ATTACHMENT ID: 12766037 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
I am guessing this is related to HIVE-11863
Need to test, but on first look seems like there is a good possibility that it has same root cause.
I checked the source code change, confirmed test cases change(all of them involve multi-insert). All of them look good to me. +1. This should fix lots of incorrect multi-insert status.
Should this issue be backported to branch-1? It looks like a bug.
